titles.title: Dandini Research Park Conveyance Act
Dandini Research Park Conveyance Act
Dandini Research Park Conveyance Act
Dandini Research Park Conveyance Act
A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain land in Washoe County, Nevada, to the Board of Regents of the University and Community College System of Nevada.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Domenici without amendment. With written report No. 109-38.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 53.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forests and Forest Health.
Mr. Gibbons moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 252.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
9/21/2005--Public Law. Dandini Research Park Conveyance Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the Board of Regents of the University and Community College System of Nevada all right, title, and interest of the United States in specified land located in Washoe County, Nevada, patented to the University of Nevada under the Recreation and Public Purposes Act.
Requires the Board of Regents to pay to the United States the Secretary's costs associated with such conveyance.
Requires, if the Board of Regents sells any part of the conveyed land: (1) the amount of consideration for the sale to reflect fair market value, as determined by an appraisal; and (2) the Board of Regents to pay the net proceeds of any sale of such land to the Secretary for use by the Director of the Bureau of Land Management in Nevada, without further appropriation.
